destinations.name: London
destinations.description: London is the capital and largest city of the United Kingdom. It is a vibrant and diverse metropolis known for its iconic landmarks, rich history, and global influence in culture, finance, fashion, and the arts.

details.long_description: London, the capital of the United Kingdom, is a dynamic and multicultural city with a rich history dating back to Roman times. Situated on the River Thames, it is a global center for politics, culture, and commerce. Famous landmarks include Buckingham Palace, the Tower of London, and the Houses of Parliament. The city is home to world-class museums like the British Museum and Tate Modern, attracting millions of visitors each year. Known for its diversity, London also has a thriving arts scene, from West End theater to music festivals. As a financial hub, it houses major institutions like the London Stock Exchange. London blends historical charm with modern innovation, offering both green spaces like Hyde Park and a cutting-edge skyline with skyscrapers like The Shard.
